thread.title: CG Visions honored to announce gold level Constructech Vision Award from Tim O’Brien Homes
thread.title_full: CG Visions honored to announce gold level Constructech Vision Award from Tim O’Brien Homes

author: prbuzz.com
title: CG Visions honored to announce gold level Constructech Vision Award from Tim O’Brien Homes
text:
Dave Bozell, President of CG Visions, shares why CG Visions and other technology partners are continuing to shape the industry.
LAFAYETTE, Ind. -- September 22, 2015 -- CG Visions is excited to announce their gold level 2015 Vision Award from “Constructech Magazine” for their work with Tim O’Brien Homes. An industry leader in BIM technology, CG Visions’ Pipeline software assists residential builders throughout the country and world. They share this award with technology partners Avid Ratings Co., BuilderMT, Inc., Sage Software, Inc., and Sales Simplicity Software. Together, these technology partners helped Tim O’Brien Homes grow and find success as a thriving residential construction business.
“We’re honored to receive this award because it continues to show our trade partners at the forefront of this industry, providing cutting-edge technology options,” says Dave Bozell, President of CG Visions. “It’s a team effort, and working with great technology partners allows us to move forward with great, collaborative technology options for the industry.”
“Constructech Magazine” honors businesses that have utilized technology in order to provide an innovative solution that has resulted in overall growth and competitiveness in their respective industry market. Companies share how their technology partners helped them overcome a challenge and where they, in turn, saw profitable change in their business.
CG Visions is excited to be recognized for this award because, as Dave Bozell shares, “Success of a client is what really drives us to create better technology. We strive to help residential builders do more with less and see ourselves as solution providers. When [Tim O’Brien Homes] asked us for a solution, we forged ahead giving them a system they needed. We’re proud to be a part of that.”
This award marks CG Visions’ 12th award and continues to acknowledge their expertise when it comes to providing residential builders a BIM technology solution.
About Tim O’Brien Homes
Tim O’Brien Homes was founded in 2007 and is located in Madison, Wisconsin. They build homes in and around the Milwaukee and Madison areas. Their mission is to provide high-quality, value-driven, energy-efficient homes that exceed homebuyer’s expectations.
CG Visions helped connect Tim O’Brien Homes with BIM by utilizing CG Visions’ BIM Pipeline software. They took a step by step approach to slowly integrate various data pieces into the system, such as base quantities and lump sums. Currently, CG Visions is helping Tim O’Brien Homes adapt Quick Start for Revit to make live key measurements possible.
About CG Visions
CG Visions is a technology provider for local, national, and global home builders. In a world that is becoming increasingly technology-based, CG Visions stands as a developer of technologies that is striving to assist builders to do more with less in order to make homebuilding more efficient and cost-effective. With software such as BIM Pipeline, e-Home, and Quickstart, CG Visions can help anyone from a local homebuilder to an international company implement technologies to streamline building processes.
